title: Jem and the Holograms Vol. 1: Showtime
description: Meet Jerrica Benton - a girl with a secret. She and her sister Kimber team with two friends to become... JEM AND THE HOLOGRAMS! But what does it mean to be JEM today? Fashion, art, action, and style collide in Jem and the Holograms: Showtime!Collects issues #1-6.
author: Kelly Thompson
